description: get Order Delete notification. For permission is controlled by App level

common_parameters.name: partner_id
common_parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests

common_parameters.name: timestamp
common_parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Format in seconds

common_parameters.name: access_token
common_parameters.description: The token for API access. Used to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple call and expire in 4 hours

common_parameters.name: shop_id
common_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for shop APIs

common_parameters.name: sign
common_parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key

request_parameters.name: cursor
request_parameters.description: The last notification_id retrieved on the page before using the cursor field(returns last seen notification_id by default). When using cursor as cursor is provided, the latest message from the index will be returned

response_parameters.name: cursor
response_parameters.description: Last notification_id returned in the page

response_parameters.name: url
response_parameters.description: Some notification may be attached with URL, it will redirect to other center

error_codes.description: The information you queried is not found

notes: The API includes test URLs for both regular and Chinese versions, as well as detailed error codes and API permissions sections. The documentation appears to be complete with no truncated sections.
